frozen_definition.name: FieldFlow
frozen_definition.signal_source: Construction worker feedback: 'This complicates it and adds time to every job' and 'construction software so complicated needs highly trained individuals'
frozen_definition.description: Ultra-simple workflow app designed specifically for blue-collar workers that streamlines daily tasks without learning curve
frozen_definition.target_user: Construction workers, mechanics, and field service technicians frustrated by complex apps that slow down their work
frozen_definition.pain_point_evidence: Direct worker complaints: 'worst app ever used' and 'teams don't have time to learn ropes of complex tools'
frozen_definition.differentiation: Built specifically for blue-collar simplicity vs. enterprise complexity, prioritizes speed over features
frozen_definition.subscription_fit: Premium includes team coordination, advanced reporting, and integration with common field service tools

pricing.trial_strategy: Free for individual workers, premium for team features and advanced reporting
